text: Kintu tomara yadi phire ya'o tabe ami niscaya tomadera kache paumche diyechi ya diye amake tomadera kache pathano hayechila. Ara amara prabhu tomadera theke prthaka kono sampradayake sthalabhisikta karabena, ara tomara tamra kono ksati karate parabe na. Nihsandeha amara prabhu saba-kichura upare tattbabadhayaka.’’
